channel.description: So guys that are uber l337 at Halo what happened at the end of Halo 3?? I'm wanting too know cause I didnt get my copy for some odd reason which is pissing me off....................... Probally just going to get a leaked copy of it off the internet. lol

item.title: True Halo 3 Ending?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“frost21, post:26, topic:149926”][quote author=Chimaera God link=topic=205400.msg1810436#msg1810436 date=1191827031]
After the credits (on any difficulty),there’s a cutscene that shows the Master Chief and Cortana in part of the cruiser that you used to escape Halo. Once they realize the war is over, and that nobody is going to come looking for them in a while, Master Chief climbs into a cryo pod. Before he does that, he tells Cortana to wake him up if she needs him.

In this case, Master Chief will probably remain frozen on the broken down cruiser until Bungie decides to make Halo 4, which they probably won’t because now there’s nobody to go to war with.
[/quote]

I wont be surprised if a halo 4 is made,with some new storyline.I have beaten legendary I dont believe the ending is different from any other difficulties.[/quote]
Legendary shows a planet or something right at the end, after he jumps in the cryo sleep chamber. So yeah, it’s either a red herring, or it’s indicative of another game set on that planet in that solar system. Who knows what’s there.

Read full topic

item.title: True Halo 3 Ending?
item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

After the credits (on any difficulty),there’s a cutscene that shows the Master Chief and Cortana in part of the cruiser that you used to escape Halo. Once they realize the war is over, and that nobody is going to come looking for them in a while, Master Chief climbs into a cryo pod. Before he does that, he tells Cortana to wake him up if she needs him.

In this case, Master Chief will probably remain frozen on the broken down cruiser until Bungie decides to make Halo 4, which they probably won’t because now there’s nobody to go to war with.

Read full topic
